dialogue.text: Realizing there's no way to beat him, you and Pibby run away again
After running for what seemed like an hour, you stumble across another familiar part of town
But it looks trashed and abandoned, just like the main city area
As the corruption finally catches up to you two, you decide to confront it again
It starts to take form again, this time as another familiar friend
Full of determination, you decide to take on your old, but corrupted, pal...
